metadata.Title: CVE-2018-11783 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description: sslheaders plugin extracts information from the client certificate and setsheaders in the request based on the configuration of the plugin. The plugindoesn't strip the headers from the request in some scenarios. This problemwas discovered in versions 6.0.0 to 6.0.3, 7.0.0 to 7.1.5, and 8.0.0 to8.0.1.

criterions.comment: trafficserver: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
